description: Extracts key goals, requirements, and deadlines from uploaded notes; returns concise bullet points organized by category

goals: Deploy the web application to a cloud platform
requirements: Build a web application using React and Node.js
deadlines: Complete Computer Science project by March 15th
Data Structures exam on March 20th (covering trees, graphs, and dynamic programming)
result.rawNotes: I need to complete my Computer Science project by March 15th. The project involves building a web application with React and Node.js. Requirements: user authentication, database integration with MongoDB, RESTful API, and responsive design. Goals: Learn full-stack development, understand authentication patterns, deploy to cloud platform. Also need to study for Data Structures exam on March 20th covering trees, graphs, and dynamic programming.
